title: Stolen by Truths
description: I was taken by Enzo. My heart and soul became his. It doesn’t stop me from fighting for what’s mine. Or from trying to be free. But I never thought that with him, I would find my home. Until I was stolen…  Stolen is book 4 in the Truth or Lies Series. It continues Kai and Enzo's story.  This book ends on a cliffhanger.
author: Ella Miles
